doc:
Chris Patton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Patton 0 Christopher David Patton (born March 15, 1971) is an American voice actor who has worked on a number of English-language versions of Japanese anime series that have been dubbed by ADV Films, Funimation, and Seraphim Digital/Sentai Filmworks. Some of his major roles at ADV include Sousuke Sagara in Full Metal Panic!, Itsuki "Ikki" Minami in Air Gear, Tatsuhiro Sato in Welcome to the N.H.K., John "JC" Armack in Sin: The Movie, Ayato Kamina in RahXephon, Rei Otohata in Super GALS!, Fakir in Princess Tutu, and Yuichi Aizawa in Kanon. At Funimation, he voiced Greed in Fullmetal Alchemist, Creed Diskenth in Black Cat, Asura in Soul Eater, and Turles in Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might. With Sentai, he voiced Keima Katsuragi in The World God Only Knows. Christopher_David_Patton ( born March_15_,_1971 ) is an_American_voice_actor who has_worked on a_number of English-language_versions of Japanese_anime_series that have_been_dubbed by ADV_Films , Funimation , and Seraphim_Digital/Sentai_Filmworks . Some of his_major_roles at ADV include Sousuke_Sagara in Full_Metal_Panic ! , Itsuki_"_Ikki_"_Minami in Air_Gear , Tatsuhiro_Sato in Welcome to the_N.H.K. , John_"_JC_"_Armack in Sin : The_Movie , Ayato_Kamina in RahXephon , Rei_Otohata in Super_GALS ! , Fakir in Princess_Tutu , and Yuichi_Aizawa in Kanon . At Funimation , he voiced Greed in Fullmetal_Alchemist , Creed_Diskenth in Black_Cat , Asura in Soul_Eater , and Turles in Dragon_Ball_Z : The_Tree of Might . With Sentai , he voiced Keima_Katsuragi in The_World_God_Only_Knows .
